title: Create unit tests for webhook handler profile fetching
description: Create unit tests for MessageWebhookHandler.fetchAndUpdateParticipantProfile using sinon stubs for InstagramApiService and ConversationRepository
dod: Unit test file created for message webhook handler
Test: fetchAndUpdateParticipantProfile successfully fetches and updates profile
Test: API success scenario - profile data stored in conversation
Test: API failure scenario - conversation created without profile, no exception thrown
Test: Cache hit scenario - API not called, cached data used
All tests pass with stubbed dependencies
